title: Wages and production
creator_credit: Arla Sorkin, Ilene Kahn, Terry Kahn Organization and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description:
Applies demand and supply principles to labour. Shows how wage rates affect the kinds and amounts of labour services offered and the amount demanded. Presents some factors affecting wage rates.
Suitable for upper secondary level.
creator_credit_for_label: Arla Sorkin, Ilene Kahn, Terry Kahn Organization and Walt Disney Productions
